name: @kumarshanu/string-to-boolean
description: it converts a given string value to a boolean value. It handles various cases such as 'true', 'false', 'yes', 'no', '1', '0', null, and undefined. It uses a switch statement with case-insensitive comparisons to determine the boolean value. If none of the predefined cases match, it attempts to parse the string value using JSON.parse. The function returns the converted boolean value.
